title: I'm going to miss losing friends because of Brexit
text:
Ever perverse, I find myself unruffled by the current Brexit kerfuffle. If we leave, I’m going to go on the spending spree to end all spending sprees and if we don’t I’m planning to go to The Big House for non-payment of taxes – NO TAXATION WITHOUT REPRESENTATION! A shortish spell in calaboose can be good for writers, as illiterate inmates may find one useful for writing letters home; Jeffrey Archer, ever the opportunist, got three books out of his time in chokey.

Of course I wish we’d got Brexit done as quickly as possible but wishing for things to be otherwise rather than making the best of the situation one finds oneself in is a sure guarantee of sorrow.

So I prefer to look on the bright side,...
description: Ever perverse, I find myself unruffled by the current Brexit kerfuffle.
